name: GUNNER (JamsWasHere)
description:
This game is simple. you shoot red, blue, and orange guys, and dodge bullets. WASD to move and MOUSE to aim and shoot. No story, but for some reason, there IS a little thing you can do in the menu. Music isn't mine, I ripped it from other things, but the credit goes to these people: Kevin Macleod, Scattle, and Kawai Sprite. The character may glitch out sometimes. 

THIS GAME DOES NOT SAVE PROGRESS

THERE ARE SECRET LEVELS YOU JUST HAVE TO FIND THE PORTAL TO GET THEM.
